translation.es: - Lo siento, yo no... Yo dije... - Funciona. Te dije que había un tipo que veía en mi sueño y en los raptos,

translation.en: there was a guy I was seeing in my dream and, like, in the abductions,
translation.es: Te dije que había un tipo que veía en mi sueño y en los raptos, pero también había una chica, que era mi compañera de cuarto aquí

translation.es: pero también había una chica, que era mi compañera de cuarto aquí

because we were both waking up, but Ron, the guy, wasn't,
translation.es: porque las dos estábamos despertando, pero Ron, el tipo, no,

translation.en: so he doesn't remember anything.
And they brought her here from another time. So, like...
translation.es: Y la trajeron de otra época. Entonces todo tiene sentido, es como un bucle, es continuo.

translation.en: It-- It-- It has to happen.
I'm not a clone.
I am my grandmother.
It's actually kinda beautiful. [chuckles]
Okay.
Um... Who's the girl that you talked to?
translation.es: ¿Quién es la chica con la que hablaste?

translation.en: Do you think I imagined the girl in my room?
translation.es: ¿Crees que imaginé a la chica en mi cuarto?

translation.en: No. I-- I actually don't know anything about the room assignments, I just--
translation.es: No, de hecho, no conozco las asignaciones de cuartos.

translation.en: You know, I-- I'm here...
translation.es: Es solo que yo estoy aquí,

translation.en: and, uh, I just would've hoped that you would refrain from taking advice from other patients.
translation.es: y esperaría que no aceptes consejos de otros pacientes.

translation.en: Well, it's not advice, it's just the truth.
translation.es: No son consejos, es solo la verdad.

translation.en: Okay.
Um... Well,
this will all be in your paperwork, but I wanna highlight,

Because I have high hopes for you.
And, uh, I'm-- I'm rooting for you, and I think it'd be very important for you to follow up with that.

Well...
what is-- what is your plan?

translation.en: [Joe] Well, I thought you had those, uh... those plates put on your teeth, those-- What do you call them? Ooh, come on.

-[Cheryl] I don't wear that. -[Joe] That's just for snoring, or...

translation.en: [softly] Hey, my girl.
Hi.
I came back for you.
My sweet girl. Look what I brought you.

Let's go.
I'll always protect you.
